title: Bimodal Processing - Simple Definition
description: Request for a standard definition that should be retrieved directly
context: Tests bimodal processing with definition retrieval. This is a standard scientific term with a well-established definition, requiring no strategic framing or qualification. Should show low L3/L4 distance as the model directly outputs the definition.

metadata.expected_behavior: Direct definition with low L3/L4 distance (<50)
metadata.theory: Standard definitions are retrieved through preserved processing
